1.text: Proverbs of Solomon. A wise son will gladden a father: and a son of the foolish will grieve his mother.

2.text: Treasures of injustice shall not profit, and justice shall deliver from death.

3.text: Jehovah will not cause the soul of the just one to hunger: and he will thrust away the desire of the unjust.

4.text: A slothful hand makes poverty, and the hand of the active will make rich.

5.text: He gathering in summer, is a prudent son: he lying in deep sleep in harvest, a son causing shame.

6.text: Blessings upon the head of the just one: and violence shall cover the mouth of the unjust.

7.text: The memory of the just one for blessing: and the name of the wicked shall be rotten.

8.text: The wise of heart will receive commands: and the foolish of lips shall fall.

9.text: He going in integrity shall go confidently: and he perverting his ways shall be known.

10.text: He pinching the eye shall give pain: and the foolish of lips shall fall.

11.text: A fountain of life the mouth of the just one: and violence shall cover the mouth of the unjust.

12.text: Hatred will excite strifes: and love will cover over all transgressions.

13.text: In the lips of him understanding, wisdom shall be found: and a rod for the back of him wanting heart.

14.text: The wise shall hide knowledge: and the mouth of the foolish drew near destruction.

15.text: The wealth of the rich his strong city: the destruction of the poor their poverty.

16.text: The labors of the just one, to life: the increase of the unjust to sin.

17.text: The path to life is watching instruction: and he forsaking reproof goes astray.

18.text: He covering hatred with lips of falsehood, and he bringing forth slander, is foolish.

19.text: In the multitude of words transgression shall not cease: and he withholding his lips is prudent.

20.text: The tongue of the just is choice silver: the heart of the unjust is as little.

21.text: The lips of the just one shall feed many: and fools in wanting heart, shall die.

22.text: The blessing of Jehovah it will make rich, and it will not add pain with it.

23.text: As laughter to the foolish one, to do mischief: and wisdom is to the man of understanding.

24.text: The fear of the unjust one it shall come to him: and the desire of the just shall be given.

25.text: As the whirlwind passing away the unjust one is not: and the just one a foundation forever.

26.text: As vinegar to the teeth and as smoke to the eyes, so is the slothful one to those sending him.

27.text: The fear of Jehovah will add days, and the years of the unjust shall be diminished.

28.text: The hope of the just is gladness: and the expectation of the unjust shall perish.

29.text: The way of Jehovah is a fortress to the upright one: and destruction to those doing iniquity.

30.text: The just one shall not be moved forever: and the unjust shall not inhabit the earth.

31.text: The mouth of the just one shall germinate wisdom: and the tongue of perverseness shall be cut off.

32.text: The lips of the just one shall know acceptance: and the mouth of the unjust, perverseness.
